output_list.criticism: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value. Restricting mintToken function to only callable by contract owner can prevent this issue.
Integer overflow in burnFrom function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value. Restricting burnFrom function to only callable by contract owner can prevent this issue.

transferFrom function allows asset theft due to incorrect access control. It allows arbitrary transfers between users, allowing attackers to steal assets. Restricting transferFrom function to only callable by contract owner can prevent this issue.
sell function allows attackers to manipulate the sell price, aka the 'tradeTrap' issue. Restricting sell function to only callable by contract owner can prevent this issue.
buy function allows attackers to manipulate the buy price, aka the 'tradeTrap' issue. Restricting buy function to only callable by contract owner can prevent this issue.
